Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

KSMathSym4.h
1 #ifndef Kassiopeia_KSMathSym4_h_
2 #define Kassiopeia_KSMathSym4_h_
3 
4 #include <limits>
5 #include <cmath>
6 
7 #include "KSMathIntegrator.h"
8 
9 #define KSMATHSYM4_STAGE 3
10 //Symplectic Integration Method Outlined in 'Symplectic and energy-conserving algorithms for solving magnetic field trajectories' S. Chin, Phys Rev E 77, 066401 (2008)
11 //NOT Recommended for Use Outside ExactTrappedParticle
12 
13 namespace Kassiopeia
14 {
15 
16  template< class XSystemType >
17  class KSMathSym4 :
18  public KSMathIntegrator< XSystemType >
19  {
20  public:
21  typedef XSystemType SystemType;
22  typedef KSMathDifferentiator< SystemType > DifferentiatorType;
23  typedef typename SystemType::ValueType ValueType;
24  typedef typename SystemType::DerivativeType DerivativeType;
25  typedef typename SystemType::ErrorType ErrorType;
26 
27  public:
28  KSMathSym4();
29  virtual ~KSMathSym4();
30 
31  public:
32  virtual void Integrate( double aTime,
33  const DifferentiatorType& aTerm,
34  const ValueType& anInitialValue,
35  const double& aStep,
36  ValueType& aFinalValue,
37  ErrorType& anError ) const;
38  private:
39  enum
40  {
41  eSubsteps = 11, eConditions = eSubsteps - 1
42  };
43 
44  mutable ValueType fValues[eConditions];
45  mutable DerivativeType fDerivatives[eSubsteps];
46  static const double fT[ KSMATHSYM4_STAGE ];
47  static const double fV[ KSMATHSYM4_STAGE ];
48 
49  };
50 
51  template< class XSystemType >
52  KSMathSym4< XSystemType >::KSMathSym4()
53  {
54  }
55 
56  template< class XSystemType >
57  KSMathSym4< XSystemType >::~KSMathSym4()
58  {
59  }
60 
61  template< class XSystemType >
62  void KSMathSym4< XSystemType >::Integrate(double /*aTime*/, const DifferentiatorType& aTerm, const ValueType& anInitialValue, const double& aStep, ValueType& aFinalValue, ErrorType& /*anError*/ ) const
63  {
64  fValues[0] = anInitialValue;
65  //
66  //Only Update Position Values
67  aTerm.Differentiate(0, fValues[0], fDerivatives[0] );
68  fValues[1]= anInitialValue + fT[2]* aStep * fDerivatives[0];
69 
70  //Only Update Momentum Values
71  aTerm.Differentiate(fV[2] * aStep, fValues[1], fDerivatives[1] );
72  fValues[2] = fValues[1] + fV[2] * aStep*fDerivatives[1];
73 
74  //Only Update Position Values
75  aTerm.Differentiate(0, fValues[2], fDerivatives[2] );
76  fValues[3]= fValues[2] + fT[1]* aStep * fDerivatives[2];
77 
78  //Only Update Momentum Values
79  aTerm.Differentiate(fV[1] * aStep, fValues[3], fDerivatives[3] );
80  fValues[4] = fValues[3] + fV[1] * aStep*fDerivatives[3];
81 
82  //Only Update Position Values
83  aTerm.Differentiate(0, fValues[4], fDerivatives[4] );
84  fValues[5]= fValues[4] + fT[0]* aStep * fDerivatives[4];
85 
86  //Only Update Momentum Values
87  aTerm.Differentiate(fV[1] * aStep, fValues[5], fDerivatives[5] );
88  fValues[6] = fValues[5] + fV[1] * aStep*fDerivatives[5];
89 
90  //Only Update Position Values
91  aTerm.Differentiate(0, fValues[6], fDerivatives[6] );
92  fValues[7]= fValues[6] + fT[1]* aStep * fDerivatives[6];
93 
94  //Only Update Momentum Values
95  aTerm.Differentiate(fV[2] * aStep, fValues[7], fDerivatives[7] );
96  fValues[8] = fValues[7] + fV[2] * aStep*fDerivatives[7];
97 
98  //Only Update Position Values
99  aTerm.Differentiate(0, fValues[8], fDerivatives[8] );
100  fValues[9]= fValues[8] + fT[2]* aStep * fDerivatives[8];
101 
102 
103  aFinalValue = fValues[9];
104 
105  return;
106  }
107  template< class XSystemType >
108  const double KSMathSym4< XSystemType >::fT[3] =
109  {1.260093847963958,-0.299186203904051,0.169139279922072};
110 
111  template< class XSystemType >
112  const double KSMathSym4< XSystemType >::fV[3] =
113  { 0., -1./22. , 6. / 11.};
114 }
115 
116 #endif
